pin : function(element,
pinRef)
Pins an element of the shift to a node on the page.
Convenience class for targeting nodes on a page.
A widget class that you can include on shift or space to allow for pinning functionality.
A convenience class to encode and decode W3C Ranges <-> opaque objects.

Returns a hash of recently viewed shifts.
refresh: function()
Resize the content area.
refresh : function()
You should always provide some kind of refresh function so that your shift can correct itself for resize operations, window size changes, showing, hiding, etc.
